txt.en: Epic Foe: Ahârtal, Hand of the First Blade

Seeking vengeance against the Men of Gondor, the Hand of the First Blade has come to Minas Tirith to cut down the innocents that still dwell within the besieged city.

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>empty</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#00FF00>Merit Gain:</rgb>
* Defeat Ahârtal, Hand of the First Blade
* Defeat Ahârtal, Hand of the First Blade in less than 30 seconds for full merit gain
Defeat Ahârtal, Hand of the First Blade
Defeat Ahârtal, Hand of the First Blade, before he can exact his revenge.
<rgb=#FF0000>DNT has escaped defeat in the tumult of combat!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Defeat DNT before he escapes in the tumult of combat</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Defeat DNT before he escapes in the tumult of combat</rgb>
You have allowed TBD to sow chaos on the wall for too long!
